page.title: 13SOCIAL CONCERNS AND NEWS
page.content: Recently it was proposed that a {by-pass}avoiding Baldock should come nearby. This was opposed by the village. Approval has been given to construct a new{tennis court. Local{fund raising events}have included a School Fete, Brownie Coffee Evening, a Horse Show and Gymkhana, a Church Fete and an Inter- Village Sports Competition. Weston{Cricket club}played a match against a Nottinghamshire side. A{village hall}porch is to be built and new carved doors fitted in memory of{John Malborough Pryor}who owned most of the land in this area. At{Hall's Green}the Rising Sun public house has been reopened after extensive building alterations. A car crashed into a ditch at the{sewage {works.}Weston has again entered the Herts best kept village competition.
